# GCDualShockGamepad

**Class**

A controller profile that supports the DualShock 4 controller.

## Declaration

```swift
class GCDualShockGamepad
```

## Overview

The DualShock 4 controller profile is similar to an extended gamepad ([doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCExtendedGamepad]), but has a touchpad with a button and two-finger tracking.



This profile also supports motion — that is, the controller’s [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCController/motion] property is non-nil. If you hold the controller in front of you, the direction of the axes are:

- The positive x-axis points to your right.
- The positive y-axis points up.
- The positive z-axis starts at the touchpad and points to you.



## Getting button input

- **touchpadButton**: The button element on the touchpad of the controller.

## Tracking finger locations

- **touchpadPrimary**: The location of the player’s primary finger on the touchpad.
- **touchpadSecondary**: The location of the player’s secondary finger on the touchpad.

## Accessing elements by name

- **DualShock controller input names**: Constants for names of DualShock 4 elements.

## Accessing controller profiles

- **extendedGamepad**: The extended gamepad profile.
- **GCPhysicalInputProfile**: The base class for controller profiles that support physical buttons, thumbsticks, and directional pads.
- **GCKeyboardInput**: A controller profile that uses the keyboard as the input device.
- **GCMouseInput**: A controller profile that tracks input from a mouse.
- **GCExtendedGamepad**: A controller profile that supports the extended set of gamepad controls.
- **GCXboxGamepad**: A controller profile that supports the Xbox controller.
- **GCDualSenseGamepad**: A controller profile that supported the DualSense controller.
- **microGamepad**: The micro gamepad profile.
- **GCMicroGamepad**: A controller profile that supports the Siri Remote.
- **GCDirectionalGamepad**: A profile that supports only the directional pad, without motion or rotation.
- **motion**: The motion input profile.
- **physicalInputProfile**: The physical input profile for the controller.
- **gamepad**: The gamepad profile.

## Inherits From

- GCExtendedGamepad

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
